CustomField.formula: IF(Overall_Score_Percent__c >0.0, Overall_Score_Percent__c, (( PD_Communication__c + PD_Responsive__c + PD_Overall__c + PM_Communication__c + PM_Responsive__c + PM_Monitor__c + PM_Overall__c + ATI_Team__c + ATI_Overall_Experience__c + NPS__c ) / 10) / 10)
CustomField.label: Overall Score (10pt) Percent
